channel.title: David Milch on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in David Milch on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ted Mann, Writer and Producer on ‘NYPD Blue,’ ‘Deadwood’ and ‘Homeland,’ Dies at 72
item.description: He worked on the Robert Altman film ‘O.C. and Stiggs,’ then won an Emmy for one of his frequent collaborations with David Milch.
